verses.verse: דִּ֭בְרֵי <WH1697> The words לְמוּאֵ֣ל <WH3927> Lemuel מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> of king מַ֝שָּׂ֗א <WH4853> the prophecy אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִסְּרַ֥תּוּ <WH3256> taught אִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH517> that his mother
מַה־ <WH4100> What בְּ֭רִי <WH1248> son וּמַֽה־ <WH4100> What בַּר־ <WH1248> son בִּטְנִ֑י <WH990> belly וּ֝מֶה <WH4100> What בַּר־ <WH1248> son נְדָרָֽי׃ <WH5088> vow

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> Give לַנָּשִׁ֣ים <WH802> unto women חֵילֶ֑ךָ <WH2428> not thy strength וּ֝דְרָכֶ֗יךָ <WH1870> nor thy ways לַֽמְח֥וֹת <WH4229> to that which destroyeth מְלָכִֽין׃ <WH4428> kings

אַ֤ל <WH408> for לַֽמְלָכִ֨ים ׀ <WH4428> [It is] not for kings לְֽמוֹאֵ֗ל <WH3927> O Lemuel אַ֣ל <WH408> for לַֽמְלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> [it is] not for kings שְׁתוֹ־ <WH8354> to drink יָ֑יִן <WH3196> wine וּ֝לְרוֹזְנִ֗ים <WH7336> princes [אֹו כ] (אֵ֣י <WH176> and ק) שֵׁכָֽר׃ <WH7941> strong drink

פֶּן־ <WH6435> lest יִ֭שְׁתֶּה <WH8354> Lest they drink וְיִשְׁכַּ֣ח <WH7911> and forget מְחֻקָּ֑ק <WH2710> the law וִֽ֝ישַׁנֶּה <WH8138> and pervert דִּ֣ין <WH1779> the judgment כָּל־ <WH3605> of all בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> afflicted עֹֽנִי׃ <WH6040> misery
תְּנוּ־ <WH5414> Give שֵׁכָ֣ר <WH7941> strong drink לְאוֹבֵ֑ד <WH6> unto him that is ready to perish וְ֝יַיִן <WH3196> and wine לְמָ֣רֵי <WH4751> unto those that be of heavy נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> hearts
יִ֭שְׁתֶּה <WH8354> Let him drink וְיִשְׁכַּ֣ח <WH7911> and forget רִישׁ֑וֹ <WH7389> his poverty וַ֝עֲמָל֗וֹ <WH5999> his misery לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יִזְכָּר־ <WH2142> and remember עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> more

פְּתַח־ <WH6605> Open פִּ֥יךָ <WH6310> thy mouth לְאִלֵּ֑ם <WH483> for the dumb אֶל־ <WH413> for דִּ֝֗ין <WH1779> in the cause כָּל־ <WH3605> of all בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of all such as are appointed חֲלֽוֹף׃ <WH2475> to destruction
פְּתַח־ <WH6605> Open פִּ֥יךָ <WH6310> thy mouth שְׁפָט־ <WH8199> judge צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> righteously וְ֝דִ֗ין <WH1777> and plead עָנִ֥י <WH6041> the cause of the poor וְאֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <WH34> and needy פ
אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> wife חַ֭יִל <WH2428> a virtuous מִ֣י <WH4310> who יִמְצָ֑א <WH4672> Who can find וְרָחֹ֖ק <WH7350> [is] far מִפְּנִינִ֣ים <WH6443> above rubies מִכְרָֽהּ׃ <WH4377> pay

בָּ֣טַח <WH982> doth safely trust בָּ֭הּ לֵ֣ב <WH3820> The heart בַּעְלָ֑הּ <WH1167> of her husband וְ֝שָׁלָ֗ל <WH7998> of spoil לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יֶחְסָֽר׃ <WH2637> in her so that he shall have no need
גְּמָלַ֣תְהוּ <WH1580> She will do ט֣וֹב <WH2896> him good וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and not רָ֑ע <WH7451> and not evil כֹּ֝֗ל <WH3605> All יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> all the days חַיֶּֽיה׃ <WH2416> of her life
דָּ֭רְשָׁה <WH1875> She seeketh צֶ֣מֶר <WH6785> wool וּפִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6593> and flax וַ֝תַּ֗עַשׂ <WH6213> and worketh בְּחֵ֣פֶץ <WH2656> willingly כַּפֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH3709> with her hands
הָ֭יְתָה <WH1961> become כָּאֳנִיּ֣וֹת <WH591> ships סוֹחֵ֑ר <WH5503> She is like the merchants' מִ֝מֶּרְחָ֗ק <WH4801> from afar תָּבִ֥יא <WH935> she bringeth לַחְמָֽהּ׃ <WH3899> her food

וַתָּ֤קָם ׀ <WH6965> She riseth בְּע֬וֹד <WH5750> is still לַ֗יְלָה <WH3915> also while it is yet night וַתִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> and giveth טֶ֣רֶף <WH2964> meat לְבֵיתָ֑הּ <WH1004> to her household וְ֝חֹ֗ק <WH2706> and a portion לְנַעֲרֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5291> to her maidens

זָמְמָ֣ה <WH2161> She considereth שָׂ֭דֶה <WH7704> a field וַתִּקָּחֵ֑הוּ <WH3947> and buyeth מִפְּרִ֥י <WH6529> it with the fruit כַ֝פֶּ֗יהָ <WH3709> of her hands [נְטַע כ] (נָ֣טְעָה <WH5193> fastened ק) כָּֽרֶם׃ <WH3754> a vineyard
חָֽגְרָ֣ה <WH2296> She girdeth בְע֣וֹז <WH5797> with strength מָתְנֶ֑יהָ <WH4975> her loins וַ֝תְּאַמֵּ֗ץ <WH553> and strengtheneth זְרֹעוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH2220> her arms

טָ֭עֲמָה <WH2938> She perceiveth כִּי־ <WH3588> for ט֣וֹב <WH2896> [is] good סַחְרָ֑הּ <WH5504> that her merchandise לֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יִכְבֶּ֖ה <WH3518> goeth not out [בַלַּיִל כ] (בַלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> night ק) נֵרָֽהּ׃ <WH5216> her candle
יָ֭דֶיהָ <WH3027> her hands שִׁלְּחָ֣ה <WH7971> She layeth בַכִּישׁ֑וֹר <WH3601> to the spindle וְ֝כַפֶּ֗יהָ <WH3709> and her hands תָּ֣מְכוּ <WH8551> hold פָֽלֶךְ׃ <WH6418> the distaff

כַּ֭פָּהּ <WH3709> her hand פָּרְשָׂ֣ה <WH6566> She stretcheth out לֶעָנִ֑י <WH6041> to the poor וְ֝יָדֶ֗יהָ <WH3027> her hands שִׁלְּחָ֥ה <WH7971> yea she reacheth forth לָֽאֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <WH34> to the needy

לֹא־ <WH3808> is not תִירָ֣א <WH3372> She is not afraid לְבֵיתָ֣הּ <WH1004> for her household מִשָּׁ֑לֶג <WH7950> of the snow כִּ֥י <WH3588> for כָל־ <WH3605> for all בֵּ֝יתָ֗הּ <WH1004> for all her household לָבֻ֥שׁ <WH3847> [are] clothed שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8144> with scarlet
מַרְבַדִּ֥ים <WH4765> herself coverings of tapestry עָֽשְׂתָה־ <WH6213> She maketh לָּ֑הּ שֵׁ֖שׁ <WH8336> [is] silk וְאַרְגָּמָ֣ן <WH713> and purple לְבוּשָֽׁהּ׃ <WH3830> her clothing

נוֹדָ֣ע <WH3045> is known בַּשְּׁעָרִ֣ים <WH8179> in the gates בַּעְלָ֑הּ <WH1167> Her husband בְּ֝שִׁבְתּ֗וֹ <WH3427> when he sitteth עִם־ <WH5973> among זִקְנֵי־ <WH2205> among the elders אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

סָדִ֣ין <WH5466> fine linen עָ֭שְׂתָה <WH6213> She maketh וַתִּמְכֹּ֑ר <WH4376> and selleth וַ֝חֲג֗וֹר <WH2289> girdles נָתְנָ֥ה <WH5414> [it] and delivereth לַֽכְּנַעֲנִֽי׃ <WH3669> unto the merchant
עֹז־ <WH5797> Strength וְהָדָ֥ר <WH1926> and honour לְבוּשָׁ֑הּ <WH3830> [are] her clothing וַ֝תִּשְׂחַ֗ק <WH7832> and she shall rejoice לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> in time אַחֲרֽוֹן׃ <WH314> to come

פִּ֭יהָ <WH6310> her mouth פָּתְחָ֣ה <WH6605> She openeth בְחָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> with wisdom וְתֽוֹרַת־ <WH8451> [is] the law חֶ֝֗סֶד <WH2617> of kindness עַל־ <WH5921> is on לְשׁוֹנָֽהּ׃ <WH3956> and in her tongue

צ֭וֹפִיָּה <WH6822> She looketh well הֲלִיכ֣וֹת <WH1979> to the ways בֵּיתָ֑הּ <WH1004> of her household וְלֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> not the bread עַ֝צְל֗וּת <WH6104> of idleness לֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not תֹאכֵֽל׃ <WH398> and eateth
קָ֣מוּ <WH6965> arise up בָ֭נֶיהָ <WH1121> Her children וַֽיְאַשְּׁר֑וּהָ <WH833> and call her blessed בַּ֝עְלָ֗הּ <WH1167> her husband וַֽיְהַֽלְלָֽהּ׃ <WH1984> [also] and he praiseth

רַבּ֣וֹת <WH7227> Many בָּ֭נוֹת <WH1323> daughters עָ֣שׂוּ <WH6213> have done חָ֑יִל <WH2428> virtuously וְ֝אַ֗תְּ <WH859> you עָלִ֥ית <WH5927> but thou excellest עַל־ <WH5921> and כֻּלָּֽנָה׃ <WH3605> all

שֶׁ֣קֶר <WH8267> [is] deceitful הַ֭חֵן <WH2580> Favour וְהֶ֣בֶל <WH1892> [is] vain הַיֹּ֑פִי <WH3308> and beauty אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> [but] a woman יִרְאַת־ <WH3373> [that] feareth יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3069> God הִ֣יא <WH1931> she תִתְהַלָּֽל׃ <WH1984> she shall be praised

תְּנוּ־ <WH5414> Give לָ֭הּ מִפְּרִ֣י <WH6529> her of the fruit יָדֶ֑יהָ <WH3027> of her hands וִֽיהַלְל֖וּהָ <WH1984> praise בַשְּׁעָרִ֣ים <WH8179> her in the gates מַעֲשֶֽׂיהָ׃ <WH4639> and let her own works
